name: GRUPO AVIACIÓN Y NÁUTICA, S.L.
about: GRUPO AVIACIÓN Y NÁUTICA, S.L., operating as Grupo One Air, is a premier flight training centre in Spain, approved by the Spanish Aviation Safety and Security Agency (AESA) and certified by the European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) as Approved Training Organisation E-ATO 190. Based at Malaga International Airport, we offer optimal weather conditions for pilot training. Founded by commercial pilots and instructors in 2010, our school is dedicated to providing top-end technologies and the highest standards of safety. We boast a modern fleet of Diamond, Cirrus, and Tecnam aircraft, along with advanced simulators, including the BOEING 737 MAX Simulator Lab. Our training programs are designed to equip students with the skills needed for successful careers in aviation, and our graduates are recruited by leading airlines worldwide. We are committed to excellence in training, ensuring our students learn to fly in a safe and advanced environment.
services: ["REFRESHER CR (A) SEP \nPrivate Airplane Pilot Course\nIntroductory Flights"]
